Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Relates to increasing the bonding authority of the New York city housing development corporation
Summary: Increases the bonding authority of the New York city housing development corporation from nineteen billion dollars to twenty billion dollars.
LawCode: Amd ยง656, Priv Hous Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the private housing finance law, in relation to increasing the bonding authority of the New York city housing development corporation
